issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
YARN-2713 has fixed one issue about the wrong RM_HOME，but I think it is not incomplete.

If the first rm in RM_HA_IDS is offline ,the RM_HOME  points to the unavailable URL.

Instead ,point to the active rm will be better.
fields.summary: "RM Home" link in AM may point to an unavailable RM in an HA setup
